content: mobile interface is optional and is disabled by default. More and more functionalities from the HMC will also be available on IBM HMC Mobile. On https://ibm.biz/IBM-Z-HMC you can find a short introduction video for HMC Mobile. Further information can be found on this page: http://ibm.biz/hmc-mobile. Note: If the setting in Change Remote Access Setting -> IP Access Control is set to Allow specific IP addresses, but if no or the wrong IP addresses are configured, you are not able to have a remote HMC connection via an web browser. Note: With HMC Driver 41/Version 2.15.0 and Driver 51/Version 2.16.0, certain tasks that required in the past to access to the SE in SOO mode were implemented as HMC tasks. With this enhancement, the HMC runs the tasks on the SE directly, without the need to logon the SE in SOO mode. Chapter 10.
